email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are currently seeking a vessel for the shipment of 150,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarao to Qingdao under CFR terms. We are considering the vessel MV OCEAN HORIZON, which has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 300m.

Could you provide us with a starting freight quote and confirm the vessel's availability for a laycan period of October 15-20?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. The MV OCEAN HORIZON is indeed available for the specified laycan period of October 15-20. Our starting freight quote for this shipment is USD 22.50 per metric ton.

Please let us know if this rate works for you or if you would like to discuss further.

Best regards,
Emily Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore from Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 22.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 20.00 per metric ton?

Additionally, could you provide details on the demurrage terms and any potential discounts for early loading?

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Iron Ore from Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 21.00 per metric ton. This rate includes a discount for early loading if the vessel is loaded within the first two days of the laycan period.

Regarding demurrage, the rate is USD 15,000 per day, applicable only if the vessel exceeds the agreed laydays.

Please let us know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Emily Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalizing Freight Terms for Iron Ore from Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. The rate of USD 21.00 per metric ton is acceptable. We also agree to the demurrage terms of USD 15,000 per day.

Could you please confirm the laycan period remains as October 15-20 and provide the final contract details for our review?

Looking forward to finalizing this shipment.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Confirmation for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

I’m glad to hear that the revised terms are acceptable. I can confirm that the laycan period remains as October 15-20. I will send over the final contract details shortly for your review and signature.

Thank you for your cooperation, and we look forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Emily Clark
